title: Authentication Member
content:
From SmartWiki
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
The Authentication Member feature allows another instance of 
SmartSimple
 to authenticate users to gain access to a the current instance without having to log in separately (Single Sign-On). 
 
Authentication Member
 can be configured on the 
Global Settings
 page in the 
Security Settings
 section.
For details on configuring this feature please see the 
Primary Authentication Controller
 article.
 
 Retrieved from ‘
https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Authentication_Member&oldid=30074
